name: wstack
description:
Push, grab and launch the boxes to the goal areas! When all of them are stacked up, you win.

  • Procedural map generation
  • Coop Multiplayer

Controls:
wasd or arrow keys: move
control: grab
space: launch
shift: change direction
q: swap mode

Map Settings:
high size bias makes many small goals, low size bias means fewer bigger goals

wstack is powered by the Godot engine and it's code is open source, check it out on  GitHub.
